author: AFP
title: Coronavirus | Thousands leave Wuhan as China lifts outbound travel ban
description: Government estimates say that as many as 55,000 people are expected to flow out of the city, which was placed under an unprecedented quarantine lockdown on January 23.
content:
Thousands of Chinese travellers flocked to catch trains leaving coronavirus-ravaged Wuhan as authorities lifted a more than two-month ban on outbound travel from the city where the global pandemic first emerged.
As the ban was lifted on schedule at midnight … [+4056 chars]
